subject: Need products to sell? We have over 250,000
body:
Doba is the Online Wholesale Drop Ship Leader
The only drop shipper that's an eBay Certified Service Provider 

http://soccervantage.com/t/q8qdi9zmi/300203

The #1 drop shipper two years in a row Access to over 250,000 wholesale products 
We ship directly to your customers The tools and support to make you successful Doba is the prime wholesale product source for those who sell on auction sites (eBay, Yahoo, Overstock, Amazon, Ubid, etc.), from their web stores (Yahoo Stores, eBay Stores, or proprietary online stores), or even those with brick and mortar locations. Start your Free Trial Today!

Hi Subscriber! You are receiving this solicitation because cruiseca@speedy.uwaterloo.ca previously agreed to receive correspondence from Copper Banana. If this service should fail to meet your expectations, feel free to disassociate yourself from our service.
